_header: When that is white waxed fallow
Subjects: sermons, verse in; death, signs of
_description: The approach of death — three couplets in a vernacular sermon

BodHat96.Transcription:
Wan þat is wyte waxit falouAnd þat is cripse waxit
                    calauWen þi neb ryveliþ as a roketAnd þin hein porfilin
                    as scarletAnd þi nose droppiþ as a boketÞan þou
                    beon yclipid kombir flet
BodHat96.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “Death Lyrics from Two Fifteenth-Century Sermon Manuscripts.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 23 [221] (1976): 341-2: 342.
